_header: Welcome my joy welcome mine hearts ease
Title(s): ‘Welcome no more but now me sle or slave’
_description: Charles d’Orléans, ‘Welcome no more but now me sle or slave’ — three 8-line stanzas (ababbcbc) and 4-line Envoy, including ‘Welcome’ anaphora

BLHar682.First Lines:
WElcome my ioy welcome myn hertis eseWelcome my lady welcome my
                    plesaunce…
BLHar682.Last Lines:
…Welcome as oft as tonge kan say on reweWelcome no more but
                    now me sle or saue
